ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: To my knowledge the staff can t be recharge not to mention that there is a bug, the staff comes with 50 charges however when you log off with it for the first
ygData.messageBody:
To my knowledge the staff can't be recharge not to mention that there is a
bug, the staff comes with 50 charges however when you log off with it for
the first time you lose the charges, i have one charge on my staff so the
sentinel efect kinda sucks since i can't use it
-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 12:32 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question


>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
>I have had my ob staff for quite a while now, it has never recharged. I
>dont think there is any way currently to do it.
>
>Mr. J Daniels
